item.title: 乌克兰战争进入第四个年头，俄罗斯锁定人口数据
item.description: 在克里姆林宫发动对乌克兰的战争期间，国家停止公布月度统计数据，因此要全面了解俄罗斯的人口状况变得越来越困难。【原文：Unlocking a full picture of Russia’s demographic situation is becoming increasingly hard after the state stopped publishing monthly statistics amid the Kremlin’s war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 沙特 FII 会议组织者理查德-阿提亚斯计划将公司上市
item.description: 理查德-阿提亚斯（Richard Attias & Associates）是沙特阿拉伯 "未来投资倡议 "峰会的组织者，该峰会每年都会吸引华尔街的大腕来到利雅得。【原文：Richard Attias & Associates, the organizer of Saudi Arabia’s Future Investment Initiative summit that draws the biggest names from Wall Street to Riyadh every year, is readying plans for a potential initial public offering.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀因食品和能源成本上涨如期加速
item.description: 尽管政府采取了监管措施，但匈牙利的通货膨胀在 6 月份还是加速了，食品、家庭能源和服务成本都出现了飙升。【原文：Hungary’s inflation accelerated in June, with a jump in the cost of food, household energy and services despite the government’s regulatory curbs.】

item.title: 南非总统拉马福萨认为美国有可能在谈判中降低关税
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）表示，在与华盛顿正在进行的谈判中，美国有可能会降低计划中的 30% 的商品关税，同时他对美国新征税的计算方法提出了质疑。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa said there’s the prospect that the US may lower a planned 30% tariff on goods in ongoing talks with Washington, as he challenged its calculation of the new levy.】

item.title: 孟加拉国将在与美国的会谈中推动更大幅度的关税削减
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对来自南亚国家的商品征收 35% 的关税，孟加拉国仍将与美国举行进一步谈判，以推动更大幅度的关税削减。【原文：Bangladesh will hold further negotiations with the United States to push for deeper tariff cuts, even as US President Donald Trump slapped a 35% levy on goods from the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 德国出口降幅超预期，美国出货量下滑
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税威胁下，德国对美国的出口额骤降至三年多来的最低水平，5 月份德国出口的下滑幅度超出预期。【原文：German exports sank more than anticipated in May as the value of shipments to the US plunged to their lowest level in more than three years amid President Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: 诺华首款婴儿疟疾治疗药物获批
item.description: 诺华公司（Novartis AG）的首款专为疟疾婴儿设计的药物获得了监管部门的批准，这是全球抗击这种蚊媒疾病的最新进展。【原文：Novartis AG won regulatory approval for the first medicine designed for babies with malaria, the latest development in the global fight against the mosquito-borne disease.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：特朗普关税期限临近，英国股市将下滑
印尼首席谈判代表赴美讨论关税问题
item.description: 印尼将立即恢复与美国的关税谈判，称仍有机会降低美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁从8月1日起征收的32%关税。【原文：Indonesia will immediately resume tariff negotiations with the US, saying there is still a chance to bring down the 32% tariff that President Donald Trump threatens to impose starting August 1.】

item.title: 越南央行准备采取措施应对关税影响
item.description: 越南中央银行就美国提高关税对越南经济和货币的影响发出警告，并随时准备采取措施抑制通货膨胀和支持经济增长。【原文：Vietnam’s central bank stands ready to take steps to curb inflation and support growth, as it warns about the impact of higher US tariffs on the economy and its currency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚意外维持关键利率不变，货币跳涨
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二维持利率不变，出乎投资者和经济学家的意料，在美国关税计划引发全球不确定性之际，澳大利亚央行发出了对政策持观望态度的信号。【原文：Australia’s central bank surprised investors and economists by keeping interest rates unchanged on Tuesday and signaled a wait-and-see approach on policy as US tariff plans stoke uncertainty across the world.】

item.title: 您的关税已寄出，封口处贴有小纸条
item.description:
对于尚未收到信函的贸易伙伴来说，还有很多事情要处理。【原文：

There’s still a lot of drama left for trading partners who haven’t received letters yet.

】

item.title: 简街利润丰厚的印度贸易凸显市场关键怪圈
item.description: 帮助简街集团在印度赚取数十亿美元的交易策略，在其他市场可能不会那么奏效。【原文：The trading strategy that helped Jane Street Group earn billions of dollars in India likely wouldn’t have worked nearly as well in other markets.】

item.title: 贸易战会让南印度成为下一个制造业中心吗？
item.description:
泰米尔纳德邦等州正在提供税收减免和快速基础设施建设，帮助该国摆脱经商难的名声。【原文：

States like Tamil Nadu are dangling tax breaks and fast-tracking infrastructure, helping the country shake off its reputation as a difficult place to do business.

】

item.title: 税制变化冲击物价，罗马尼亚将维持利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行可能会维持借贷成本不变，因为政府最近宣布的增税措施预计将在未来几个月引发新一轮通胀高峰。【原文：Romania’s central bank is likely to leave borrowing costs unchanged as the government’s recently announced tax hikes are expected to trigger a new spike in inflation over the coming months.】

item.title: 澳大利亚债券吸引两年来最大的日本资金流入
item.description: 澳大利亚债券吸引了日本投资者两年多来最大规模的资金流入，因为较低的货币对冲成本提高了澳大利亚债券的吸引力。【原文：Australian bonds attracted the largest inflow from Japanese investors in more than two years as lower currency hedging costs boosted the attractiveness of the Antipodean bonds.】

item.title: 美国出人意料地威胁征收 25% 关税，为马来西亚汇率走势蒙上阴影
item.description: 美国出人意料地决定将其威胁对马来西亚征收的关税提高到 25%，这意味着贸易几乎肯定会成为这个东南亚国家周三利率决定的主要因素。【原文：The surprise US decision to raise its threatened tariff on Malaysia to 25% means trade will almost certainly dominate the Southeast Asian nation’s interest rate decision on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度礼品城交易所将进行首次外币上市
item.description: 印度 NSE 国际交易所的目标是在本季度吸引首家外币股票上市，该交易所称这是一个里程碑，将为企业展示一个新的筹资渠道。【原文：India’s NSE International Exchange is aiming to attract its first equity listing in a foreign currency this quarter, a milestone it says will demonstrate a new fundraising avenue for firms.】

item.title: 深圳证券交易所敦促中国企业加快 IPO 申请速度
item.description: 中国深圳证券交易所敦促经纪商加快企业在创业板的上市申请，因为中国政府正努力促进民营企业发展，重振受到关税上涨威胁的经济。【原文：China’s Shenzhen Stock Exchange has urged brokers to speed up applications for companies to list on the ChiNext board as officials seek to boost private enterprise and reignite the economy under threat from rising tariffs.】

item.title: 日产 CDS 因 40 亿美元外国债券计划跃升至 16 年新高
item.description: 在日产汽车公司开始准备出售 40 亿美元的外币债券后，该公司的信用违约掉期扩大至 2009 年以来的最高水平，加剧了人们对利息支出上升的担忧。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s credit-default swaps widened to the highest level since 2009 after the automaker began preparing a $4 billion foreign-currency bond sale, stoking concerns about rising interest expenses.】

item.title: 印度卢比因关税担忧表现逊于大多数亚洲新兴货币
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 泰国有信心通过贸易提议降低美国关税
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，根据美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的将大部分美国商品的进口税降至零的提议，泰国仍对获得低于其宣布的 36% 的关税税率持乐观态度。【原文：Thailand remains optimistic about securing a lower tariff rate than the 36% levy announced by President Donald Trump based on an offer to bring down import tax on most US goods to zero, according to Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira.】

item.title: 马来西亚将继续就关税问题与美国接触：马来西亚贸易部
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对东南亚国家征收 25% 的关税（高于 4 月份宣布的 24%）之后，马来西亚将继续与美国接触，以达成一项 "互利 "的贸易协定。【原文：Malaysia will continue to engage with the US for a “mutually beneficial” trade agreement after President Donald Trump threatened to impose a 25% tariff on the Southeast Asian nation, higher than the 24% announced in April.】

item.title: 据说 Stonepeak 正在洽谈投资华平投资的普林斯顿大学
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Stonepeak Partners 正在洽谈对数据中心运营商普林斯顿数字集团（Princeton Digital Group）的投资，这家美国基础设施投资商正寻求在亚太地区建立业务。【原文：Stonepeak Partners is in talks to invest in data center operator Princeton Digital Group, people familiar with the matter said, as the US infrastructure investor seeks to build up its presence in Asia Pacific.】

item.title: 即使夏季电力需求增加，中国仍避免进口昂贵的液化天然气
item.description: 闷热的气温提高了中国的用电需求，但还不足以重振中国对成本高昂的液化天然气的现货采购。【原文：Sweltering temperatures are pushing up appetite for electricity in China — just not yet enough to revive the country’s spot purchases of costly liquefied natural gas.】

item.title: 中国华友钴业利润受印尼影响创历史新高
item.description: 中国浙江华友钴业股份有限公司（Zhejiang Huayou Cobalt Co.浙江华友钴业股份有限公司预计将公布创纪录的半年度盈利报告，因为该公司正在加紧印尼的镍矿项目，并将享受钴价上涨带来的利好。【原文：China’s Zhejiang Huayou Cobalt Co. Ltd expects to report record half-year earnings, as it ramps up nickel projects in Indonesia and enjoys the tailwind from rising cobalt prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚商业条件和信心在澳大利亚央行决议前大幅上升
item.description: 由于销售额、盈利能力和就业人数激增，澳大利亚的商业形势大为改观，同时信心也在攀升，这表明企业部门的复苏可能正在与储备银行的宽松周期保持一致。【原文：Australian business conditions jumped as sales, profitability and employment surged while confidence also climbed, suggesting a recovery in the corporate sector may be unfolding in line with the Reserve Bank’s easing cycle.】

item.title: 报告显示印度经济适用房降至 7 年最低水平
item.description: 莱坊（Knight Frank）的一份报告发现，印度价格低于500万卢比（58553美元）的房屋供应量降至2018年以来的最低点，这表明开发商偏离这一细分市场的趋势仍在继续。【原文：India’s supply of houses costing less than 5 million rupees ($58,553) fell to their lowest since 2018, a Knight Frank report found, signaling that the trend of developers pivoting away from this segment continues.】

item.title: 交易商评估特朗普关税声明，铁矿石大幅上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在公布第一波威胁征收更高关税的信函后，表示愿意进行更多谈判，铁矿石因此出现波动。【原文：Iron ore fluctuated as US President Donald Trump signaled he was open to more negotiations after he unveiled his first wave of letters threatening to impose higher tariffs.】

item.title: 焦点转向谈判，新兴市场货币上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在对十多个国家设定关税税率后不久表示愿意进行谈判，新兴市场货币收复了部分失地。【原文：Emerging market currencies recovered some of their losses after US President Donald Trump signaled he is open to negotiations shortly after setting tariff rates for more than a dozen countries.】
